Package src.cinema

Class Seats

Object
Seats
public class Seats extends Object
An instance of a seat specific to a movie screening

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) int
    Cinema
    The cinema hall in which this seat belongs to
    (package private) int
    seatID
    The unique identifier for this seat within the cinema hall
    (package private) SeatType
    seatType
    Type of seat such as normal,couple,etc
    (package private) boolean
    taken
    A boolean variable to indicate whether or not the seat has been booked by a guest

  • Constructor Details

    • Seats

      public Seats(int c, int ID, SeatType type)
      Creates an instance of a seat class
      Parameters:
      c - The cinema hall that this seat will be located in.
      ID - The unique identifier for this seat
      type - The type of seat this is such as normal,couple,etc

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static Seats[] create(int Cinema)
      A function typically invoked by the movie screening class to generate an array of empty seats
      Parameters:
      Cinema - The cinema hall that the movie screening would be taking place in
      Returns:
      the array of empty seats

    • create

      public static Seats[] create(int Cinema, File f) throws FileNotFoundException
      A function used to load the pre-existing seat layout for a movie screening on opening the app
      Parameters:
      Cinema - The cinema hall that this movie screening would be taking place in
      f - The text file containing all the relevant seat information
      Returns:
      the array of seats
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException
